data.title: Carolyn Ann Mcbroom Obituary 2022
data.meta_description: Carolyn Ann McBroom, 68, of Paragould, passed from this life on Sunday, November 27, 2022, at her residence. She was born on February 13, 1954, in Paragould. Carolyn graduated f...
data.text:
Carolyn Ann McBroom, 68, of Paragould, passed from this life on Sunday, November 27, 2022, at her residence. She was born on February 13, 1954, in Paragould. Carolyn graduated from Delaplaine High School. She married Terry on July 1, 1972. Carolyn worked at Emerson Electric for many years before finishing her working career with Walmart. She enjoyed hunting and fishing, and she loved to cheer for her Atlanta Braves. Carolyn had a special love for her dogs. She bottle fed and raised an entire litter, and they filled her heart with love. Carolyn was preceded in death by her parents, Jerry and Elsie Miller; husband, Terry McBroom; and brother, Ricky Flanery.

Carolyn is survived by her son, Brian (Valerie) McBroom of Cherokee Village; grandchildren, Taylor (John) Doyle, Xavier McBroom, Damien McBroom, Briance McBroom, James Prince, Aaron Ard, and Amber Smith; great grandson, Spencer Doyle; sisters, Tina Wood, Donna Miller, and Marilyn Pierceall; and her loyal dogs, Chloe and Slick.

A visitation will be Friday, December 2, 2022, from 10-11 AM at Heath Funeral Home. The funeral will begin at 11 AM with Rev. John Abanathy officiating. Burial will follow in Greene County Memorial Gardens. Instead of flowers and gifts, please send memorials to The Greene County Animal Farm, 1711 Paragould Plaza #6132, Paragould, AR 72450.
